text: Obmenyavshiye zhizn' i imushchestvo na ray - eto: kayushchiyesya pered Allakhom za svoi maleyshiye prostupki; voskhvalyayushchiye, kotoryye yezheminutno blagodaryat Allakha; stranstvuyushchiye na pryamom puti Allakha, kotoryye stremyatsya sovershat' dobroye dlya sebya i dlya drugikh; klanyayushchiyesya i padayushchiye nits, smirenno i postoyanno vystaivayushchiye molitvu; prikazyvayushchiye delat' dobro po nastavleniyu Allakha; uderzhivayushchiye ot zlykh del, kotoryye zapreshcheny religiyey; sleduyushchiye nazidaniyam Allakha, Yego ustanovleniyu i shariatu. Obraduy zhe (o prorok!) veruyushchikh
